name: pgaLineNumber
description: Begin with "001" and sequentially increment the line number on subsequent PG01 records, if applicable.

name: governmentAgencyProcessingCode
description:
Allowed values for Biologics sub-types are:
	ALG, BBA, BDP, BLD, BLO, CGT, HCT, PVE, VAC, XEN

name: intendedUseCode
description: Refer to the Intended Use Codes table below for allowed values

name: disclaimer
description:
“A” (= product is not regulated by this agency) indicating that there is no agency declaration requirement. This field is left blank for no disclaimer.
	“F” indicating that the product is manufactured in any state of the US, the District of Columbia, or Puerto Rico and sourced directly to the warehouse without ever leaving the US. May only be used for FDA on Entry Type 21.
	No other codes are accepted
